message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a unique product that I believe will be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $20000. This price reflects its exceptional quality and potential. Let me know your thoughts!

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value you're placing on the product, but I'm looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $15000? I'm very interested in purchasing this product.
